questionTitle: ________ a letter here for you.
I get a letter ________ my boyfriend every day.
Can I ________ you a question?
The boss wants ________.
There's a river. Can you ________?
There is nothing very ________ to do in that small town.
Don't leave your clothes ________ about on the bedroom floor.
When water freezes, it ________ into ice.
How about ________ me a hand? Sure. I'd be glad to help.
Mr. Brown ________ a car if he had enough money.
The window was shut, and he ________ to open it.
There ________ no rain here since last month.
Jane is the ________ of the two sisters.
He ________ you now, but he won't believe you tomorrow.
The aeroplane ________ down at Cairo on its way to India .
My uncle went out of the house ________ ago.
After lunch he went to his room to ________.
I wonder ________ we shall catch the last bus.
It is rude to laugh ________ other people.
Did you like my friend? Very much. She's ________ charming as you said she was.
